00019 #define _eol_window_sprite_count  9

00026 /*definitions*/
00027 void eol_window_init()
00028 {
00029   int i;
00030   eol_logger_message(
00031       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00032       "eol_window:initializing\n");
00033   _eol_window_manager = eol_resource_manager_init(
00034     "eol_window_manager",
00035     _eol_window_max,
00036     sizeof(eolWindow),
00037     eolTrue,
00038     eol_window_delete,
00039     eol_window_load_data_from_file
00040     );
00041   atexit(eol_window_close);
00042   for (i = 0; i < _eol_window_sprite_count;i++)
00043   {
00044     if (strlen(_eol_window_sprite_files[i]) > 0)
00045     {
00046       _eol_window_sprites[i] = eol_sprite_load(_eol_window_sprite_files[i],-1,-1);
00047     }
00048   }
00049   _eol_window_initialized = eolTrue;
00050   eol_component_config();
00051   eol_logger_message(
00052       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00053       "eol_window:initialized\n");
00054 }
00055 
00056 eolBool eol_window_initialized()
00057 {
00058   return _eol_window_initialized;
00059 }

00062 void eol_window_config()
00063 {
00064   /*TODO load from config*/
00065   _eol_window_max = 16;
00066   strcpy(_eol_window_sprite_files[0],"images/UI/windowbackground1.png");
00067   strcpy(_eol_window_sprite_files[1],"images/UI/windowborder_corner_UL.png");
00068   strcpy(_eol_window_sprite_files[2],"images/UI/windowborder_corner_UR.png");
00069   strcpy(_eol_window_sprite_files[3],"images/UI/windowborder_corner_BL.png");
00070   strcpy(_eol_window_sprite_files[4],"images/UI/windowborder_corner_BR.png");
00071   strcpy(_eol_window_sprite_files[5],"images/UI/windowborder_horiz.png");
00072   strcpy(_eol_window_sprite_files[6],"images/UI/windowborder_vert.png");
00073   strcpy(_eol_window_sprite_files[7],"images/UI/windowborder_horiz.png");
00074   strcpy(_eol_window_sprite_files[8],"images/UI/windowborder_vert.png");
00075 }

00077 void eol_window_clean()
00078 {
00079   if (!eol_window_initialized())
00080   {
00081     eol_logger_message(
00082         EOL_LOG_INFO,
00083         "eol_window:cannot clean, not initialized\n");
00084     return;
00085   }
00086   if (!_eol_window_manager)return;
00087   eol_resource_manager_clean(_eol_window_manager);
00088 }
00089 
00090 void eol_window_close()
00091 {
00092   eol_logger_message(
00093       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00094       "eol_window:closing\n"
00095   );
00096   eol_resource_manager_free(&_eol_window_manager);
00097   _eol_window_max = 0;
00098   _eol_window_initialized = eolFalse;
00099   eol_logger_message(
00100       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00101       "eol_window:closed\n"
00102   );
00103 }
00104 
00105 void eol_window_draw_all()
00106 {
00107   GList *l = NULL;
00108   GList *c = NULL;
00109   eolWindow *win;
00110   if (!eol_window_initialized())return;
00111   for (l = _eol_window_stack;l != NULL; l = l->next)
00112   {
00113     win = (eolWindow*)l->data;
00114     if (win == NULL)continue;
00115     if (win->hidden)continue;
00116     if (win->drawGeneric)
00117     {
00118       eol_window_draw_generic(win);
00119     }
00120     if (win->draw != NULL)
00121     {
00122       win->draw(win);
00123     }
00124     for (c = win->components;c != NULL;c = c->next)
00125     {
00126       if (c->data == NULL)continue;
00127       eol_component_draw((eolComponent *)c->data,win->rect);
00128     }
00129   }
00130 }
00131 void eol_window_update_all()
00132 {
00133   GList *l = NULL;
00134   GList *c = NULL;
00135   GList *update = NULL;
00136   eolBool updateHandled = eolFalse;
00137   eolWindow *win;
00138   if (!eol_window_initialized())return;
00139   l = g_list_last(_eol_window_stack);
00140   for (;l != NULL;l = l->prev)
00141   {
00142     win = (eolWindow*)l->data;
00143     if ((win != NULL)&&(win->update != NULL)&& (!win->sleeping))
00144     {
00145       /*update all components*/
00146       for (c = win->components;c != NULL; c= c->next)
00147       {
00148         if (c->data != NULL)
00149         {
00150           if (eol_component_update(c->data))
00151           {
00152             update = g_list_append(update,c->data);
00153           }
00154         }
00155       }
00156     }
00157     /*call update for window*/
00158     updateHandled = win->update(win,update);
00159     if (update != NULL)
00160     {
00161       g_list_free(update);
00162     }
00163     if ((updateHandled) || (!win->passesInput))break;
00164   }
00165 }
00166 
00167 eolWindow *eol_window_new()
00168 {
00169   eolWindow *win = NULL;
00170   if (!eol_window_initialized())
00171   {
00172     eol_logger_message(
00173       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00174       "eol_window:used uninitialized\n");
00175     return NULL;
00176   }
00177   win = (eolWindow *)eol_resource_new_element(_eol_window_manager);
00178   if (win == NULL)
00179   {
00180     eol_logger_message(
00181       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00182       "eol_window:failed to get new resource\n");
00183     return NULL;
00184   }
00185   /*new windows are added at the top of the stack, ie: last to draw*/
00186   win->id = eol_resource_element_get_id(_eol_window_manager,win);
00187   _eol_window_stack = g_list_append(_eol_window_stack,win);
00188   return win;
00189 }
00190 
00191 void eol_window_free(eolWindow **win)
00192 {
00193   if (!eol_window_initialized())return;
00194   _eol_window_stack = g_list_remove(_eol_window_stack,*win);
00195   eol_resource_free_element(_eol_window_manager,(void **)win);
00196 }
00197 
00198 void eol_window_delete(void *window)
00199 {
00200   GList *l = NULL;
00201   eolWindow *win;
00202   if (!eol_window_initialized())return;
00203   if (window)return;
00204   win = (eolWindow *)window;
00205   if (win->customData != NULL)
00206   {
00207     if (win->custom_delete != NULL)
00208     {
00209       win->custom_delete(win->customData);
00210     }
00211   }
00212   if (win->components != NULL)
00213   {
00214     for (l = win->components;l != NULL;l = l->next)
00215     {
00216       if (l->data != NULL)
00217       {
00218         eol_component_free((eolComponent**)&l->data);
00219       }
00220     }
00221     g_list_free(win->components);
00222     win->components = NULL;
00223   }
00224   if (win->callbacks != NULL)
00225   {
00226     free(win->callbacks);
00227   }
00228   _eol_window_stack = g_list_remove(_eol_window_stack,win);
00229   memset(win, 0, sizeof(eolWindow));
00230 }

00232 void eol_window_load_label(eolWindow *win,eolKeychain *def)
00233 {
00234   eolUint       id;
00235   eolLine       text;
00236   eolLine       name;
00237   eolLine       justify;
00238   eolLine       wordWrap;
00239   eolUint       fontSize;
00240   eolVec3D      color = {1,1,1};
00241   eolFloat      alpha = 1;
00242   eolLine       fontfile; 
00243   eolRectFloat  rect;
00244   eolComponent *comp;
00245   char        * font = NULL;
00246   
00247   eol_line_cpy(fontfile,"\0");
00248   eol_line_cpy(justify,"\0");
00249   eol_line_cpy(wordWrap,"\0");
00250   if ((!win) || (!def))return;
00251   
00252   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_uint(&id, def, "id");
00253   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_uint(&fontSize, def, "fontSize");
00254   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_rectfloat(&rect, def, "rect");
00255   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_line(text, def, "text");
00256   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_line(name, def, "name");
00257   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_line(justify, def, "justify");
00258   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_line(fontfile, def, "fontName");
00259   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_line(wordWrap, def, "wordWrap");
00260   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_vec3d(&color, def, "color");
00261   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_float(&alpha, def, "alpha");
00262   
00263   if (strlen(fontfile) > 0)font = fontfile;
00264   comp = eol_label_new(
00265     id,
00266     name,
00267     rect,
00268     win->rect,
00269     eolTrue,
00270     text,
00271     eol_font_justify_from_string(justify),
00272     eol_true_from_string(wordWrap),
00273     fontSize,
00274     font,
00275     color,
00276     alpha
00277   );
00278   eol_window_add_component(win,comp);
00279 }

00281 void eol_window_load_button(eolWindow *win,eolKeychain *def)
00282 {
00283   eolComponent *comp;
00284   eolLine buttonType;
00285   eolUint id;
00286   eolRectFloat rect;
00287   eolLine justify;
00288   eolLine buttonText;
00289   eolLine name;
00290   eolLine hotkey;
00291   eolLine hotmod;
00292   eolInt hotkeybutton;
00293   eolInt hotkeymod;
00294   eolLine buttonFile;
00295   eolLine buttonHighFile;
00296   eolLine buttonHitFile;
00297   
00298   if ((!win) || (!def))return;
00299   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_line(buttonType, def, "buttonType");
00300   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_line(name, def, "name");
00301   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_uint(&id, def, "id");
00302   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_rectfloat(&rect, def, "rect");
00303   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_line(justify, def, "justify");/*NOTE: not used*/
00304   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_line(buttonText, def, "buttonText");
00305   
00306   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_line(hotkey, def, "hotkey");
00307   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_line(hotmod, def, "hotkeymod");
00308   
00309   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_line(buttonFile, def, "buttonImage");
00310   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_line(buttonHighFile, def, "buttonHigh");
00311   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_line(buttonHitFile, def, "buttonHit");
00312   
00313   hotkeybutton = eol_input_parse("key", hotkey);
00314   hotkeymod = eol_input_parse("mod",hotmod);
00315   if (hotkeymod < 0)hotkeymod = 0;
00316   if (eol_line_cmp(buttonType,"STOCK") == 0)
00317   {
00318     comp = eol_button_stock_new(
00319       id,
00320       name,
00321       rect,
00322       win->rect,
00323       buttonText,
00324       hotkeybutton,
00325       hotkeymod,
00326       eolFalse
00327     );
00328     eol_window_add_component(win,comp);
00329   }
00330   else if (eol_line_cmp(buttonType,"TEXT") == 0)
00331   {
00332     comp = eol_button_text_new(
00333       id,
00334       name,
00335       rect,
00336       win->rect,
00337       buttonText,
00338       hotkeybutton,
00339       hotkeymod,
00340       eolFalse
00341     );
00342     eol_window_add_component(win,comp);
00343   }
00344   else if (eol_line_cmp(buttonType,"CUSTOM") == 0)
00345   {
00346     comp = eol_button_new(
00347       id,
00348       name,
00349       rect,
00350       win->rect,
00351       buttonText,
00352       eolButtonCustom,
00353       hotkeybutton,
00354       hotkeymod,
00355       eolFalse,
00356       buttonFile,
00357       buttonHighFile,
00358       buttonHitFile
00359     );
00360     eol_window_add_component(win,comp);
00361   }
00362 }
00363 
00364 eolBool eol_window_load_data_from_file(char * filename,void *data)
00365 {
00366   eolWindow *window;
00367   eolConfig *conf;
00368   eolKeychain *chain, *item;
00369   int i;
00370   eolLine typecheck;
00371   eolRectFloat tempr;
00372   eolUint sw,sh;
00373   if (!data)return eolFalse;
00374   window = (eolWindow *)data;
00375   conf = eol_config_load(filename);
00376   if (!conf)return eolFalse;
00377   eol_graphics_get_size(&sw,&sh);
00378   eol_config_get_line_by_tag(window->name,conf,"name");
00379   eol_config_get_rectfloat_by_tag(&tempr,conf,"rect");
00380   if (tempr.x < 0)
00381   {
00382     tempr.x = sw + tempr.x;
00383   }
00384   if (tempr.y < 0)
00385   {
00386     tempr.y = sh + tempr.y;
00387   }
00388   if (tempr.w <= 0)
00389   {
00390     tempr.w = sw - tempr.w - tempr.x;
00391   }
00392   if (tempr.h <= 0)
00393   {
00394     tempr.h = sh - tempr.h - tempr.y;
00395   }
00396   window->rect.x = tempr.x;
00397   window->rect.y = tempr.y;
00398   window->rect.w = tempr.w;
00399   window->rect.h = tempr.h;
00400   eol_config_get_bool_by_tag(&window->canHasFocus,conf,"canHasFocus");
00401   eol_config_get_bool_by_tag(&window->drawGeneric ,conf,"drawGeneric");
00402   eol_config_get_bool_by_tag(&window->passesInput ,conf,"passesInput");
00403   
00404   /*add components*/
00405   if (eol_config_get_keychain_by_tag(&chain,conf,"components"))
00406   {
00407     if (chain != NULL)
00408     {
00409       if (chain->keyType == eolKeychainList)
00410       {
00411         for (i = 0; i < chain->itemCount; i++)
00412         {
00413           item = eol_keychain_get_list_nth(chain, i);
00414           if (item != NULL)
00415           {
00416             eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_line(typecheck, item, "type");
00417             if (eol_line_cmp(typecheck,"BUTTON") == 0)
00418             {
00419               eol_window_load_button(window,item);
00420               continue;
00421             }
00422             if (eol_line_cmp(typecheck,"LABEL") == 0)
00423             {
00424               eol_window_load_label(window,item);
00425               continue;
00426             }
00427           }
00428         }        
00429       }
00430     }
00431   }                                      
00432   
00433   eol_config_free(&conf);
00434   return eolTrue;
00435 }
00436 
00437 void eol_window_free_if_outside_click(eolWindow **win)
00438 {
00439   if ((!win) || (!*win))return;
00440   if ((eol_mouse_input_state(eolMouseLeft)) ||
00441     (eol_mouse_input_state(eolMouseRight)))
00442   {
00443     if (!eol_mouse_in_rect((*win)->rect))
00444     {
00445       eol_window_free(win);
00446     }
00447   }
00448 }
00449 
00450 void eol_window_draw_generic(eolWindow *win)
00451 {
00452   eolFloat scaleX = 1,scaleY = 1;
00453   if (!win)return;
00454   if (!eol_window_initialized())return;
00455   /*draw the background*/
00456   if ((_eol_window_sprites[0] != NULL) &&
00457     (_eol_window_sprites[0]->frameWidth != 0) &&
00458     (_eol_window_sprites[0]->frameHeight != 0))
00459   {
00460     scaleX = win->rect.w / (float)_eol_window_sprites[0]->frameWidth;
00461     scaleY = win->rect.h / (float)_eol_window_sprites[0]->frameHeight;
00462     eol_sprite_draw_transformed(_eol_window_sprites[0],0,win->rect.x,win->rect.y,
00463                                 scaleX,scaleY,0,0,0,
00464                                 eol_vec3d(1,1,1),1);
00465   }
00466   /*draw the borders*/
00467   /*top*/
00468   if ((_eol_window_sprites[5] != NULL) &&
00469     (_eol_window_sprites[5]->frameWidth != 0) &&
00470     (_eol_window_sprites[5]->frameHeight != 0))
00471   {
00472     scaleX = win->rect.w / (float)_eol_window_sprites[5]->frameWidth;
00473     eol_sprite_draw_transformed(_eol_window_sprites[5],0,win->rect.x,
00474                                 win->rect.y - _eol_window_sprites[5]->frameHeight,
00475                                 scaleX,1,0,0,0,
00476                                 eol_vec3d(1,1,1),1);
00477   }
00478   /*left*/
00479   if ((_eol_window_sprites[6] != NULL) &&
00480     (_eol_window_sprites[6]->frameWidth != 0) &&
00481     (_eol_window_sprites[6]->frameHeight != 0))
00482   {
00483     scaleY = win->rect.h / (float)_eol_window_sprites[6]->frameHeight;
00484     eol_sprite_draw_transformed(_eol_window_sprites[6],0,
00485                                 win->rect.x - _eol_window_sprites[6]->frameWidth,
00486                                 win->rect.y,
00487                                 1,scaleY,0,0,0,
00488                                 eol_vec3d(1,1,1),1);
00489   }
00490   /*bottom*/
00491   if ((_eol_window_sprites[7] != NULL) &&
00492     (_eol_window_sprites[7]->frameWidth != 0) &&
00493     (_eol_window_sprites[7]->frameHeight != 0))
00494   {
00495     scaleX = win->rect.w / (float)_eol_window_sprites[7]->frameWidth;
00496     eol_sprite_draw_transformed(_eol_window_sprites[7],0,win->rect.x,
00497                                 win->rect.y + win->rect.h,
00498                                 scaleX,1,0,0,0,
00499                                 eol_vec3d(1,1,1),1);
00500   }
00501   /*right*/
00502   if ((_eol_window_sprites[8] != NULL) &&
00503     (_eol_window_sprites[8]->frameWidth != 0) &&
00504     (_eol_window_sprites[8]->frameHeight != 0))
00505   {
00506     scaleY = win->rect.h / (float)_eol_window_sprites[8]->frameHeight;
00507     eol_sprite_draw_transformed(_eol_window_sprites[8],0,
00508                                 win->rect.x + win->rect.w,
00509                                 win->rect.y,
00510                                 1,scaleY,0,0,0,
00511                                 eol_vec3d(1,1,1),1);
00512   }
00513   
00514   /*draw the corner stones*/
00515   /*UL*/
00516   if ((_eol_window_sprites[1] != NULL) &&
00517     (_eol_window_sprites[1]->frameWidth != 0) &&
00518     (_eol_window_sprites[1]->frameHeight != 0))
00519   {
00520     eol_sprite_draw(_eol_window_sprites[1],
00521                     0,
00522                     (win->rect.x - _eol_window_sprites[1]->frameWidth),
00523                     (win->rect.y - _eol_window_sprites[1]->frameHeight));
00524   }
00525   /*UR*/
00526   if ((_eol_window_sprites[2] != NULL) &&
00527     (_eol_window_sprites[2]->frameWidth != 0) &&
00528     (_eol_window_sprites[2]->frameHeight != 0))
00529   {
00530     eol_sprite_draw(_eol_window_sprites[2],
00531                     0,
00532                     (win->rect.x + win->rect.w),
00533                     (win->rect.y - _eol_window_sprites[2]->frameHeight));
00534   }
00535   /*BL*/
00536   if ((_eol_window_sprites[3] != NULL) &&
00537     (_eol_window_sprites[3]->frameWidth != 0) &&
00538     (_eol_window_sprites[3]->frameHeight != 0))
00539   {
00540     eol_sprite_draw(_eol_window_sprites[3],
00541                     0,
00542                     (win->rect.x - _eol_window_sprites[3]->frameWidth),
00543                     (win->rect.y + win->rect.h));
00544   }
00545   /*BR*/
00546   if ((_eol_window_sprites[4] != NULL) &&
00547     (_eol_window_sprites[4]->frameWidth != 0) &&
00548     (_eol_window_sprites[4]->frameHeight != 0))
00549   {
00550     eol_sprite_draw(_eol_window_sprites[4],
00551                     0,
00552                     (win->rect.x + win->rect.w),
00553                     (win->rect.y + win->rect.h));
00554   }
00555 }
00556 
00557 void eol_window_add_component(eolWindow *win,eolComponent *comp)
00558 {
00559   if ((win == NULL)||(comp == NULL)||(!eol_window_initialized()))
00560   {
00561     return;
00562   }
00563   win->components = g_list_append(win->components,comp);
00564   if (win->components == NULL)
00565   {
00566     eol_logger_message(
00567       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00568       "eol_window:unable to add new component!\n");
00569   }
00570 }
00571 
00572 eolComponent *eol_window_get_component_by_id(eolWindow *win,eolUint id)
00573 {
00574   GList *c = NULL;
00575   eolComponent *comp;
00576   if (!win)return NULL;
00577   for (c = win->components;c != NULL;c = c->next)
00578   {
00579     if (c->data != NULL)
00580     {
00581       comp = (eolComponent *)c->data;
00582       if (comp->id == id)return comp;
00583     }
00584   }
00585   return NULL;
00586 }
00587 
00588 void eol_window_allocat_callbacks(eolWindow *win,eolUint count)
00589 {
00590   if (!win)return;
00591   if (win->callbacks != NULL)
00592   {
00593     eol_logger_message(
00594       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00595       "eol_window:attempted to re-allocated window callbacks for window %s\n",
00596       win->name);
00597     return;
00598   }
00599   win->callbacks = (eolWindowCallback*)malloc(sizeof(eolWindowCallback)*count);
00600   if (win->callbacks == NULL)
00601   {
00602     eol_logger_message(
00603       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00604       "eol_window:cannot allocate callbacks for window %s\n",
00605       win->name);
00606     return;
00607   }
00608   memset(win->callbacks,0,sizeof(eolWindowCallback)*count);
00609   win->callbackCount = count;
00610 }
00611 
00612 eolFloat eol_window_get_relative_position(eolInt position,eolUint range)
00613 {
00614   if (range == 0)return 0;
00615   return (eolFloat)position/(eolFloat)range;
00616 }
00617 
00618 eolUint eol_window_get_refcount(eolWindow * window)
00619 {
00620   return eol_resource_element_get_refcount(_eol_window_manager,window);
00621 }
00622 
00623 eolWindow * eol_window_load_from_file(eolLine file)
00624 {
00625   eolWindow *window;
00626   eolLine filename;
00627   if (!eol_window_initialized())
00628   {
00629     return NULL;
00630   }
00631   window =
00632   (eolWindow *)eol_resource_manager_load_resource(_eol_window_manager,file);
00633   if (window == NULL)return NULL;
00634   window->id = eol_resource_element_get_id(_eol_window_manager,window);
00635   eol_resource_element_get_filename(filename, _eol_window_manager,window);
00636   _eol_window_stack = g_list_append(_eol_window_stack,window);
00637   return window;
00638 }

00640 void eol_window_hide(eolWindow *win)
00641 {
00642   if (!win)return;
00643   win->hidden = eolTrue;
00644 }
00645 
00646 void eol_window_show(eolWindow *win)
00647 {
00648   if (!win)return;
00649   win->hidden = eolFalse;
00650 }

00652 void eol_window_sleep(eolWindow *win)
00653 {
00654   if (!win)return;
00655   win->sleeping = eolTrue;
00656 }
00657 
00658 void eol_window_wakeup(eolWindow *win)
00659 {
00660   if (!win)return;
00661   win->sleeping = eolFalse;
00662 }
